column3: Commit message needs to credit @achow101 for finding this :)
Updated with the simpler solution by @TheBlueMatt (from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/6ba2214e0fe57ecb9271819d2422ec44a9020a8d).\n\nCredited @achow101.
This is a back-portable short fix and for 0.16 we should consider removing the group entirely (over further overhaul the custom fee settings)

- If you add the null check, do you still need the awkward `std::max(0, std::min(1, ` construction? after all, button is defined to return 0 if no such button exists http://doc.qt.io/qt-4.8/qbuttongroup.html#button\n- Wouldn't it be better to remove the group completely if there is only one choice?
groupCustomFee might not be the best name for this variable, after all it's a button not a group (also snake_case?)
